citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries and Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)
citeinfo.title: Oceanographic Data from the University of Alaska Fairbanks

descript.abstract: Contains various small sets of University of Alaska Fairbanks oceanographic data such as light transmission, fisheries, cloud cover, sea surface temperature, sediment chemistry, water chemistry, ADCP (acoustic Doppler current profiler), nitrogen uptake, iron, and oxygen consumption data. Some data are archived on 9-track tape, some in report form and are held by individual scientists.
descript.purpose: To document various small sets of oceanographic data such as light transmission, fisheries, cloud cover, sea surface temperature, sediment chemistry, water chemistry, adcp, nitrogen uptake, cton, and oxygen consumption data.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
